Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraAdmin
Namespace: "urn:zimbraAdmin"
ModifyDataSource SOAP Command

Changes attributes of the given data source. Only the attributes specified in the request are modified. To change the name, specify "zimbraDataSourceName" as an attribute.

note: this request is by default proxied to the account's home server

Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required true

ModifyDataSourceRequest

    <ModifyDataSourceRequest id="{account-id}"> ## ModifyDataSourceRequest
        <dataSource [id="..."] /> ## Id
        (<a n="{key}" /> ## Attr)*
    </ModifyDataSourceRequest>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <ModifyDataSourceRequest> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
@id Required (only 1) Type:String
Existing account ID
/dataSource Required (only 1) Data source specification
/dataSource@id Optional (0 or 1) Type:String
ID
/a Optional (0 or more) Attributes
/a@n Required (only 1) Type:String
Key

ModifyDataSourceResponse

    <ModifyDataSourceResponse /> ## ModifyDataSourceResponse
